content:
Managing Resources

Now that you've setup some Suppliers lets link your Resources to your Suppliers.

Click the Resources link above to begin.

Managing your Project

Each Project needs at least one Build Element which allow Projects to be broken down into manageable elements.

Click the 'Add a Build Element' button below to add your first Build Element.

Using Build Elements

With a Build Element created you're now able to add job Tasks

Scroll down to your listed Build Elements and click the flashing link to view the Build Element details page.

Managing your Tasks

You'll need to learn how to use Resources effectively in Tasks.

Scroll down to your listed Build Elements and click the flashing link to view the Build Element details page.

Managing your Tasks

You'll need to learn how to use Resources effectively in Tasks.

Scroll down to your listed Build Elements and click the flashing link to view the Build Element details page.

Managing your Suppliers

Now that you've added your first Resource, it's important you understand how Suppliers work.

Click the flashing Suppliers link above to begin.

Your Suppliers

Now you've succesfully updated Your Company click the Supplier link above to add a New Supplier.

Managing Resources

Now that you've setup some Suppliers lets link your Resources to your Suppliers.

Click the Resources link above to begin.

Successfully linked a Supplier to a Resource

You can now go back to the Dashboard by clicking the flashing Dashboard link above.
